title: Praying with my wife
transcript: I want to perform group Salah with my wife but I'm not sure about the formation is it's the same formation as performing a group Salah with a man which is on my right side and very close to me no the answer is no she had a woman's place is behind a man so if you're praying with your wife she must stand behind you and not uh uh next to you and Allah knows BL
